# nbp_rates
Utility for getting exchange rates from NBP (Polish National Bank)

```python
| => nbp_rates --currency eur --select-period 12
2023-02-01	4.708
2023-02-02	4.7079
2023-02-03	4.692	<--MIN
2023-02-06	4.7195
2023-02-07	4.7476
2023-02-08	4.7402
2023-02-09	4.7363
2023-02-10	4.7716
2023-02-13	4.7895	<--MAX
2023-02-14	4.7847
2023-02-15	4.7593
2023-02-16	4.7728
2023-02-17	4.7747
2023-02-20	4.7542
2023-02-21	4.7469
2023-02-22	4.7538
2023-02-23	4.7525
2023-02-24	4.7245
2023-02-27	4.7162
2023-02-28	4.717
```

```python
| => nbp_rates
2023-03-01	4.6925
2023-03-02	4.675	<--MIN
2023-03-03	4.7046
2023-03-06	4.7073
2023-03-07	4.6871
2023-03-08	4.7018
2023-03-09	4.6836
2023-03-10	4.6838
2023-03-13	4.6848
2023-03-14	4.6909
2023-03-15	4.7015
2023-03-16	4.6978
2023-03-17	4.7062
2023-03-20	4.7109	<--MAX
```
